name: Last Summer
description:
“Last Summer” is a Walking Adventure Game with a dark road.

This game starts from the school classroom.
Let's walk home.
However, there is no single road.
You will get lost soon.
Choose right way to home.

You will experience various scenery along the way.
Beautiful scenery, Nostalgic scenery, and Strange scenery...
Think about what they means.

Can you arrive at home?
Or will you arrive at something else?
Play this game and check it out.
